description: Trendnet TK-205i 2-Port KVM Switch Kit lets you manage two PC's with just one set of keyboard, monitor, and mouse. Switch between the PC's with a simple press of a button! The KVM cables are built into the TK-205i so users can start controlling two PC's instantly. The TK-205i is a self-powered KVM Switch loaded with friendly features. With its Hot-Plug, Auto-Scan, Audible Feedback, and Hot-Key operations, the TK-205i is the perfect choice for managing multiple PC's.
title: TRENDnet 2-Port PS2 KVM Switch and Cable Kit, TK-205K
